itinerary.day1Heading: Arrive Jaipur - Delhi (260 Kms / 06 hours drive)
itinerary.day1Overview:
Arrival In the morning, we will pick you up from your place and drive to Delhi. On arrival at Delhi, check-in at the hotel. Later, we will visit the Akshardham temple.

Akshardham is a Hindu temple complex in Delhi representing centuries of traditional Indian and Hindu culture, spirituality and architecture. The building was inspired and moderated by Pramukh Swami Maharaj, the spiritual head of the Bochasanwasi Shri Akshar Purushottam Swaminarayan Sanstha, whose 3,000 volunteers helped 7,000 artisans construct Akshardham.

In the evening transfer to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Overview:
We will go out for a sightseeing tour of Delhi. We will visit Raj Ghat (the cremation sites of Mahatma Gandhi), Shanti Vana (the cremation sites of Jawaharlal Nehru) and Jama Masjid. We will also drive to Red Fort and Chandni Chowk.

In the afternoon, we will visit Qutub Minar (built by Qutub-ud-Din Aibek in 1199), Humayun's Tomb and India Gate (War Memorial Arch). Also, we will drive past President's House, Parliament House, Government Secretariat Buildings and of course, Connaught Place (shopping centre).

An overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day3Heading: Delhi - Jaipur Departure (260 Kms / 06 hours drive)
itinerary.day3Overview: In the morning after breakfast, we will drive back to Jaipur. On arrival at Jaipur, we will drop you at your desired place.

overView.heading: Sabarmati Ashram: Gandhi's Legacy
overView.text: Embark on a spiritual journey at the Sabarmati Ashram, once the residence of Mahatma Gandhi. Explore the tranquil ashram grounds, learn about Gandhi's life and philosophy, and pay homage to the Father of the Nation.

overView.heading: Adalaj Stepwell: Architectural Wonder
overView.text: Marvel at the intricate and beautifully carved Adalaj Stepwell, a unique example of Indian architectural ingenuity. Descend into the cool depths of this ancient stepwell and admire the ornate carvings and intricate designs.

overView.heading: Akshardham Temple: Spiritual Serenity
overView.text: Experience spiritual serenity at the magnificent Akshardham Temple, a stunning example of Hindu architectural brilliance. Explore the intricate carvings, serene gardens, and multimedia exhibitions showcasing Indian culture and traditions.

overView.heading: Nal Sarovar Bird Sanctuary: Avian Paradise
overView.text: Immerse yourself in nature's beauty at the Nal Sarovar Bird Sanctuary, a wetland paradise teeming with diverse avian life. Embark on a bird-watching adventure and spot rare and migratory bird species in their natural habitat.

overView.heading: Rani Ki Vav: Intricate Stepwell
overView.text: Uncover the architectural marvel of Rani Ki Vav, an exquisitely carved stepwell dating back to the 11th century. Descend into the intricate depths and admire the ornate carvings that adorn the walls and pillars.

overView.heading: Kankaria Lake: Urban Oasis
overView.text: Escape the city's hustle and bustle at Kankaria Lake, a serene urban oasis. Take a leisurely stroll around the lake, enjoy a boat ride, or visit the charming amusement park and vibrant night markets.

overView.heading: Calico Museum of Textiles: Textile Heritage
overView.text: Explore India's rich textile heritage at the Calico Museum of Textiles, which houses an impressive collection of textiles, fabrics, and garments from across the country. Admire the intricate designs and learn about the fascinating history of Indian textiles.
